item.text: “If you indeed obey the Lord your God and are careful to observe all his commandments I am giving you today, the Lord your God will elevate you above all the nations of the earth.
All these blessings will come to you in abundance if you obey the Lord your God:

<st data-num="0859" class="">You</st> will be <st data-num="01288" class="">blessed</st> in the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> and <st data-num="01288" class="">blessed</st> in the <st data-num="07704" class="">field</st>.<n id="1" />

Your <st data-num="06529 0990">children</st><n id="1" /> will be <st data-num="01288" class="">blessed</st>, as well as the <st data-num="06529" class="">produce</st> of your <st data-num="0127" class="">soil</st>, the <st data-num="06529" class="">offspring</st> of your <st data-num="0929" class="">livestock</st>, the <st data-num="07698" class="">calves</st> of your <st data-num="0504" class="">herds</st>, and the <st data-num="06251" class="">lambs</st> of your <st data-num="06629" class="">flocks</st>.
Your <st data-num="02935" class="">basket</st> and your <st data-num="04863" class="">mixing bowl</st> will be <st data-num="01288" class="">blessed</st>.

<st data-num="0859" class="">You</st> will be <st data-num="01288" class="">blessed</st> when you <st data-num="0935" class="">come in</st> and <st data-num="01288" class="">blessed</st> when <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> <st data-num="03318" class="">go out</st>.<n id="1" />
The Lord will cause your enemies who attack you to be struck down before you; they will attack you from one direction but flee from you in seven different directions.
The Lord will decree blessing for you with respect to your barns and in everything you do—yes, he will bless you in the land he is giving you.
The Lord will designate you as his holy people just as he promised you, if you keep his commandments and obey him.
Then all the peoples of the earth will see that you belong to the Lord, and they will respect you.
The Lord will greatly multiply your children, the offspring of your livestock, and the produce of your soil in the land that he promised your ancestors he would give you.
The Lord will open for you his good treasure house, the heavens, to give you rain for the land in its season and to bless all you do; you will lend to many nations but you will not borrow from any.
The Lord will make you the head and not the tail, and you will always end up at the top and not at the bottom, if you obey his commandments that I am urging you today to be careful to do.
But you must not turn away from all the commandments I am giving you today, to either the right or left, nor pursue other gods and worship them.
“But if you ignore the Lord your God and are not careful to keep all his commandments and statutes I am giving you today, then all these curses will come upon you in full force:

<st data-num="0859" class="">You</st> will be <st data-num="0779" class="">cursed</st> in the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> and <st data-num="0779" class="">cursed</st> in the <st data-num="07704" class="">field</st>.
Your <st data-num="02935" class="">basket</st> and your <st data-num="04863" class="">mixing bowl</st> will be <st data-num="0779" class="">cursed</st>.

Your <st data-num="06529 0990">children</st><n id="1" /> will be <st data-num="0779" class="">cursed</st>, as well as the <st data-num="06529" class="">produce</st> of your <st data-num="0127" class="">soil</st>, the <st data-num="07698" class="">calves</st> of your <st data-num="0504" class="">herds</st>, and the <st data-num="06251" class="">lambs</st> of your <st data-num="06629" class="">flocks</st>.
You will be cursed when you come in and cursed when you go out.

“The Lord will send on you a curse, confusing you and opposing you in everything you undertake until you are destroyed and quickly perish because of the evil of your deeds, in that you have forsaken me.
The Lord will plague you with deadly diseases until he has completely removed you from the land you are about to possess.

<st data-num="03068" class="">He</st><n id="1" /> will <st data-num="05221" class="">afflict</st> you with <st data-num="07829" class="">weakness</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="06920" class="">fever</st>, <st data-num="01816" class="">inflammation</st>, <st data-num="02746" class="">infection</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="02719" class="">sword</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="07711" class="">blight</st>, and <st data-num="03420" class="">mildew</st>; these will <st data-num="07291" class="">attack</st> you <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> you <st data-num="06" class="">perish</st>.

The<n id="1" /> <st data-num="08064 0834">sky</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="05921" class="">above</st> your <st data-num="07218" class="">heads</st> will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="05178" class="">bronze</st> and the <st data-num="0776 0834">earth</st> <st data-num="08478" class="">beneath</st> you <st data-num="01270" class="">iron</st>.
The Lord will make the rain of your land powder and dust; it will come down on you from the sky until you are destroyed.

“The Lord will allow you to be struck down before your enemies; you will attack them from one direction but flee from them in seven directions and will become an object of terror to all the kingdoms of the earth.

Your <st data-num="05038" class="">carcasses</st> will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="03978" class="">food</st> for <st data-num="03605" class="">every</st> <st data-num="05775" class="">bird</st> of the <st data-num="08064" class="">sky</st> and <st data-num="0929" class="">wild animal</st> of the <st data-num="0776" class="">earth</st>, and <st data-num="0369" class="">there will be no</st> one to <st data-num="02729" class="">chase</st> them <st data-num="02729" class="">off</st>.
The Lord will afflict you with the boils of Egypt and with tumors, eczema, and scabies, all of which cannot be healed.
The Lord will also subject you to madness, blindness, and confusion of mind.

You will <st data-num="01961 04959">feel</st> your <st data-num="01961 04959">way along</st> at <st data-num="06672" class="">noon</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">like</st> the <st data-num="05787" class="">blind person</st> <st data-num="04959" class="">does</st> in <st data-num="0653" class="">darkness</st> and you will <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="06743" class="">succeed</st> <st data-num="01870" class="">in anything</st> you <st data-num="01870" class="">do</st>;<n id="1" /> you will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="0389" class="">constantly</st> <st data-num="06231" class="">oppressed</st> and <st data-num="03605 03117">continually</st> <st data-num="01497" class="">robbed</st>, with <st data-num="0369" class="">no</st> one to <st data-num="03467" class="">save</st> you.

You will <st data-num="0781" class="">be engaged</st> to a <st data-num="0802" class="">woman</st>, and <st data-num="0312" class="">another</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> will <st data-num="07693" class="">rape</st><n id="1" /> her. You will <st data-num="01129" class="">build</st> a <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> but <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03427" class="">live</st> in it. You will <st data-num="05193" class="">plant</st> a <st data-num="03754" class="">vineyard</st> but <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> even <st data-num="02490" class="">begin to use</st> it.

Your <st data-num="07794" class="">ox</st> will be <st data-num="02873" class="">slaughtered</st> before your very <st data-num="05869" class="">eyes</st>, but you will <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">of</st> it. Your <st data-num="02543" class="">donkey</st> will be <st data-num="01497" class="">stolen</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">from</st> you <st data-num="06440" class="">as</st> you <st data-num="06440" class="">watch</st> and will <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="07725" class="">returned</st> to you. Your <st data-num="06629" class="">flock of sheep</st> will be <st data-num="05414" class="">given</st> to your <st data-num="0341" class="">enemies</st>, and <st data-num="0369" class="">there will be no</st> one to <st data-num="03467" class="">save</st> you.

Your <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st> and <st data-num="01323" class="">daughters</st> will be <st data-num="05414" class="">given</st> to <st data-num="0312" class="">another</st> <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> while <st data-num="05869" class="">you</st> <st data-num="07200" class="">look</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">on</st> <st data-num="03616" class="">in vain</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st>, and you will <st data-num="0369 0410">be powerless</st> to <st data-num="03027" class="">do anything about it</st>.<n id="1" />

As for the <st data-num="06529" class="">produce</st> of your <st data-num="0127" class="">land</st> and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> your <st data-num="03018" class="">labor</st>, a <st data-num="05971 0834">people</st> you do <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03045" class="">know</st> will <st data-num="0398" class="">consume</st> it, and you will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="07535" class="">nothing but</st> <st data-num="06231" class="">oppressed</st> and <st data-num="07533" class="">crushed</st> for the <st data-num="03605" class="">rest</st> of your <st data-num="03117" class="">lives</st>.

You will <st data-num="01961" class="">go</st> <st data-num="07696" class="">insane</st> from <st data-num="05869 04758">seeing</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">all</st> <st data-num="07200" class="">this</st>.
The Lord will afflict you in your knees and on your legs with painful, incurable boils—from the soles of your feet to the top of your head.
The Lord will force you and your king whom you will appoint over you to go away to a people whom you and your ancestors have not known, and you will serve other gods of wood and stone there.
You will become an occasion of horror, a proverb, and an object of ridicule to all the peoples to whom the Lord will drive you.
“You will take much seed to the field but gather little harvest, because locusts will consume it.

You will <st data-num="05193" class="">plant</st> <st data-num="03754" class="">vineyards</st> and <st data-num="05647" class="">cultivate</st> them, but you will <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="08354" class="">drink</st> <st data-num="03196" class="">wine</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">or</st> <st data-num="0103" class="">gather in</st> grapes, <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> <st data-num="08438" class="">worms</st> will <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> them.

You will <st data-num="01961" class="">have</st> <st data-num="02132" class="">olive trees</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">throughout</st> your <st data-num="01366" class="">territory</st>, but you will <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="05480" class="">anoint</st> yourself with <st data-num="08081" class="">olive oil</st>, <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> the <st data-num="02132" class="">olives</st> will <st data-num="05394" class="">drop off</st> the trees while still unripe.<n id="1" />

You will <st data-num="03205" class="">bear</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st> and <st data-num="01323" class="">daughters</st> but <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">keep</st> them, <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> they will be <st data-num="01980" class="">taken</st> into <st data-num="07628" class="">captivity</st>.

<st data-num="06767" class="">Whirring locusts</st><n id="1" /> will <st data-num="03423" class="">take over</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">every</st> <st data-num="06086" class="">tree</st> and all the <st data-num="06529" class="">produce</st> of your <st data-num="0127" class="">soil</st>.

The <st data-num="01616" class="">resident foreigners</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> reside <st data-num="07130" class="">among</st> you will <st data-num="05927" class="">become</st> <st data-num="04605" class="">higher</st> and <st data-num="04605" class="">higher</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">over</st> you, and <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> will <st data-num="03381" class="">become</st> <st data-num="04295" class="">lower</st> and <st data-num="04295" class="">lower</st>.
They will lend to you, but you will not lend to them; they will become the head, and you will become the tail!
“All these curses will fall on you, pursuing and overtaking you until you are destroyed, because you would not obey the Lord your God by keeping his commandments and statutes that he has given you.
These curses will be a perpetual sign and wonder with reference to you and your descendants.
“Because you have not served the Lord your God joyfully and wholeheartedly with the abundance of everything you have,
instead in hunger, thirst, nakedness, and poverty you will serve your enemies whom the Lord will send against you. They will place an iron yoke on your neck until they have destroyed you.
The Lord will raise up a distant nation against you, one from the other side of the earth as the eagle flies, a nation whose language you will not understand,

a <st data-num="01471" class="">nation</st> of <st data-num="05794" class="">stern</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">appearance</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> will <st data-num="05375" class="">have</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">no</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">regard</st> for the <st data-num="02205" class="">elderly</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">or</st> <st data-num="02603" class="">pity</st> for the <st data-num="05288" class="">young</st>.

They<n id="1" /> will <st data-num="0398" class="">devour</st> the <st data-num="06529" class="">offspring</st> of your <st data-num="0929" class="">livestock</st> and the <st data-num="06529" class="">produce</st> of your <st data-num="0127" class="">soil</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> you are <st data-num="08045" class="">destroyed</st>. They will <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="07604" class="">leave</st> you with any <st data-num="01715" class="">grain</st>, <st data-num="08492" class="">new wine</st>, <st data-num="03323" class="">olive oil</st>, <st data-num="07698" class="">calves</st> of your <st data-num="0504" class="">herds</st>,<n id="2" /> or <st data-num="06251" class="">lambs</st> of your <st data-num="06629" class="">flocks</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> they have <st data-num="06" class="">destroyed</st> you.

They will besiege all of your villages until all of your high and fortified walls collapse—those in which you put your confidence throughout the land. They will besiege all your villages throughout the land the Lord your God has given you.
You will then eat your own offspring, the flesh of the sons and daughters the Lord your God has given you, because of the severity of the siege by which your enemies will constrict you.

The <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> among you who is <st data-num="03966" class="">by nature</st> <st data-num="07390" class="">tender</st> and <st data-num="06028" class="">sensitive</st> will <st data-num="07489 05869">turn against</st> his <st data-num="0251" class="">brother</st>, his <st data-num="02436" class="">beloved</st> <st data-num="0802" class="">wife</st>, and his <st data-num="03499 0834 03498">remaining</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">children</st>.

He will <st data-num="05414" class="">withhold</st> from <st data-num="0259" class="">all</st> of <st data-num="01992" class="">them</st> his <st data-num="01121" class="">children’s</st> <st data-num="01320" class="">flesh</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> he is <st data-num="0398" class="">eating</st> (since there <st data-num="07604" class="">is</st> <st data-num="01097 03605">nothing else</st> <st data-num="07604" class="">left)</st>, because of the <st data-num="04689" class="">severity</st> of the <st data-num="04692" class="">siege</st> by <st data-num="0834" class="">which</st> your <st data-num="0341" class="">enemy</st> will <st data-num="06693" class="">constrict</st><n id="1" /> you in your <st data-num="03605 08179">villages</st>.

Likewise, the <st data-num="03966" class="">most</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="07390" class="">tender</st> and <st data-num="06028" class="">delicate</st> of your women, <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> would <st data-num="03808" class="">never</st> <st data-num="05254" class="">think</st> of <st data-num="03322" class="">putting</st> even the <st data-num="03709" class="">sole</st> of her <st data-num="07272" class="">foot</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">ground</st> because of her <st data-num="06026 07391">daintiness</st>,<n id="2" /> will <st data-num="07489 05869">turn against</st> her <st data-num="02436" class="">beloved</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">husband</st>, her <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st> and <st data-num="01323" class="">daughters</st>,
and will secretly eat her afterbirth and her newborn children (since she has nothing else), because of the severity of the siege by which your enemy will constrict you in your villages.
“If you refuse to obey all the words of this law, the things written in this scroll, and refuse to fear this glorious and awesome name, the Lord your God,
then the Lord will increase your punishments and those of your descendants—great and long-lasting afflictions and severe, enduring illnesses.

He will <st data-num="07725" class="">infect</st> you with <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="04064" class="">diseases</st> of <st data-num="04714" class="">Egypt</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> you <st data-num="03025 06440">dreaded</st>, and they will <st data-num="01692" class="">persistently afflict</st> you.<n id="2" />
Moreover, the Lord will bring upon you every kind of sickness and plague not mentioned in this scroll of commandments, until you have perished.
There will be very few of you left, though at one time you were as numerous as the stars in the sky, because you will have disobeyed the Lord your God.

This is what will happen: Just as the Lord delighted to do good for you and make you numerous, so he will also take delight in destroying and decimating you. You will be uprooted from the land you are about to possess.
The Lord will scatter you among all nations, from one end of the earth to the other. There you will worship other gods that neither you nor your ancestors have known, gods of wood and stone.

Among those nations you will have no rest, nor will there be a place of peaceful rest for the soles of your feet, for there the Lord will give you an anxious heart, failing eyesight, and a spirit of despair.

Your <st data-num="02416" class="">life</st> will <st data-num="01961 08511">hang in doubt</st> <st data-num="05048" class="">before</st> you; you will be <st data-num="06342" class="">terrified</st> by <st data-num="03915" class="">night</st> and <st data-num="03119" class="">day</st> and will <st data-num="0539" class="">have</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">no</st> <st data-num="0539" class="">certainty</st> of <st data-num="02416" class="">surviving</st> from one day to the next.<n id="1" />

In the <st data-num="01242" class="">morning</st> you will <st data-num="0559" class="">say</st>, ‘<st data-num="04310 05414">If only</st> it were <st data-num="06153" class="">evening</st>!’ And in the <st data-num="06153" class="">evening</st> you will <st data-num="0559" class="">say</st>, ‘<st data-num="04310 05414">I wish</st> it were <st data-num="01242" class="">morning</st>!’ <st data-num="06343 03824 0834">because of the things</st> you will <st data-num="06342" class="">fear</st> and the <st data-num="04758 05869 0834">things</st> you will <st data-num="07200" class="">see</st>.

Then the Lord will make you return to Egypt by ship, over a route I said to you that you would never see again. There you will sell yourselves to your enemies as male and female slaves, but no one will buy you.”
